title: Food Packaging Fonts?
content:
I am trying to put together a reference file on fonts that are often used in food packaging. A perfect example would be TARTINE SCRIPT or FLORENS. Can anyone suggest some others? Thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Food-Packaging-Fonts.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013125142/http:/typophile.com/files/Food-Packaging-Fonts.gif) | 20.29 KB |
author: Bailiwick

comments.content: Sudtipos. Yes, good suggestion. Some of these are perfect. Thanks!

See [FontShop's newsletters](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013125142/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontfeed/archives/soft-script-fonts.cfm) on this very topic.

While on that page, click the link for "Type In Use" for more related articles.

Yael Miller of Miller Design in NY did an article in 2010 on the top 15 packaging fonts of the 2000's. Don't remember the site tho.

I will e-mail her and find out.

[http://www.thedieline.com/blog/2009/5/12/top-15-fonts-for-packaging-desi...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013125142/http:/www.thedieline.com/blog/2009/5/12/top-15-fonts-for-packaging-design.html "http://www.thedieline.com/blog/2009/5/12/top-15-fonts-for-packaging-design.html")

Surprised not to see something from Sudtipos on her list.

n.
